Description of incident: "Quest Diagnostics regrets to notify you of a breach of your Protected Health Information (PHI) which we became aware of on November 28, 2016.  Here are the details of the breach: On November 26th an unauthorized third party accessed the MyQuest by Care360® internet application and obtained PHI of approximately 34,000 patients.  The data included name, date of birth, lab results, and, in some instances, telephone numbers. The affected information did not include Social Security numbers, credit card information, insurance or other financial information."More information: https://oag.ca.gov/ecrime/databreach/reports/sb24-65390
